description: This file defines a React component named ProtectedRoute that conditionally renders its children based on the user's authentication status. If the user is not authenticated, it displays a fallback message or component.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children, fallback = null })
methods.description: React functional component that renders its children if the user is authenticated, otherwise shows a fallback or a default message.

ctags.name: ProtectedRoute
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProtectedRoute({ children, fallback = null }) {$/
